article: Miss Williams was a teacher, and there were thirty small children in her class. They were very nice, and Miss Williams liked  _  of them, but they often lost clothes. It was  _  , and the weather was cold. The children's mothers always  _  them to school with warm coats and hats and gloves . The children came into the classroom in the morning and  took off  their coats and hats and gloves. They  _  their coats and hats on hooks on the wall, and their gloves in the pockets of  _  coats. But  last  Tuesday, Miss Williams found two small blue gloves on the floor in the evening, and in the morning she said to the children, "  _  gloves are these?", but  no one  answered. Then she looked at Dick. "Haven't you got blue gloves, Dick?" she asked him. "Yes, Miss," he answered, "but they  _  be mine. I've lost mine."
